casebody.data:
JONES
v.
CRANFORD 80P18-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Darron J. Jones, for Jones, Darron J.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of July 2018 by Plaintiff to File Amended Complaint:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
